word_mean: 蚁走感：一种触幻觉，有小虫在皮肤上爬行的感觉。最常见于可卡因或苯丙胺中毒

sentence.Network_en: The woman developed lightheadedness, dyspnoea, tongue numbness, muscle twitching and formication on the legs and back.
sentence.Network_cn: 这位妇女出现头晕 、 呼吸困难 、 舌头麻木 、 肌肉抽搐、下肢和背部走蚁感.

list.exp: 桃叶蓼地上部分含甲酸

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from Latin formicatio(n-), from formicare 'crawl like an ant' (said of the pulse or skin), from formica 'ant'

means.word_mean: 1. hallucinated sensation that insects or snakes are crawling over the skin; a common side-effect of extensive use of cocaine or amphetamines
